title: Android 13 Developer Preview builds are now available for these devices
content:
It’s raining Android 13 Beta builds! Now that the keynote event of Google I/O 2022 is over, we are all very excited about the launch of the second beta for Android 13. As usual, Google’s Pixel line of smartphones will be the first to gain access to the new beta software. However, other OEMs have

The post Android 13 Developer Preview builds are now available for these devices appeared first on XDA.
description: Android 13 Developer Preview builds based on the beta release are available from multiple OEMs for a bunch of devices. Read on!
